context.p: You can configure the article attributes so that users can see the article details along with its content. You configure the article attributes that you want to display including the custom metadata parameter in the answer view page and the ask a question page. By default, your users can see article details, including Document ID, Version, Status, and Display Date.

table.title: List of Article Attributes
table.desc: This two-column table describes the article attributes that you can specify to display on the Answer and Ask a Question pages.

entry.p: The article’s status. Displays whether the article is published or in draft state.
The publish date of a published article or the last modified date of a draft article.
The user who created the article.
The date that the article was last modified.
The user who last updated the article.
